name: Avoid (itch) (wolf+void)
description:
AVOID

Avoid the obstacles in this simple but addictive little game with attitude. Enjoy!

Controls

Space: "Flap"
Shift: Use Boost

Tools

  • Photoshop
  • Built with Unity 2019.1
  • SFX made with BFXR

Credits

  • Game by Phil Gullberg (Wolf & Void)
  • Music by abstractionmusic.com
  • Art by BagfullOfWrong
